resources.string: The only productivity \napp you will need!

Productiva is allows your smartphone to keep track of your daily essentials. The purpose of this app is to make the mobile device users more efficient wherever they are by allowing them to jot down notes, set up task lists and work along with a pomodoro timer. Productiva features a minimalistic style while providing the user with necessary functionalities.
Productiva was developed as a project work by Tausif Ahmed and Arian Islam, two Software Engineering undergrads from Shahjalal University of Science and Technology.
